text: Is there a way to set the Julia DEPOT_PATH variable by a command line argument?

elements.text: Is there a way to set the Julia DEPOT_PATH variable by a command line argument?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
No, but you can use the `JULIA_DEPOT_PATH` environment variable.

text: Julia will use whatever the environment variable is when you start Julia so yea you can overwrite it.

text: you can also only set it for the Julia session with `JULIA_DEPOT_PATH=/foo/bar julia`
